title: IDN font. Help!!!
content:
Hello! i need help!  
I need to know the name of this font and where I can get it.  
It is for a school project, so if someone have this font, please contact me!!! :vD

Thanks! Joel.

BACKGROUND OF THE FONT:  
-It was used for the IDN Conference one year ago.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [IDNfont.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=IDNfont.jpg) | 158.33 KB |
author: Joel De Sa

comments.content:
By the way. I know is an Avant Garde Modification. But i need the font, because is double work to modificate the font…

Thanks!!!

_\> But I need the font, because is double work to modificate the font…_

You don’t really need the font (which doesn’t exist IMO) to do this kind of dead easy modification, do you? Just convert the type to outlines and remove the appropriate control points, there’s really nothing to it.
